metadata.title: CVE-2023-52692 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:scarlett2: Add missing error check to scarlett2_usb_set_config()scarlett2_usb_set_config() calls scarlett2_usb_get() but was not checkingthe result. Return the error if it fails rather than continuing with aninvalid value.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
